landing.heroSubtitle: Connect with top talent on the baltek Karyera platform. Streamline your entire hiring process from job posting to final interviews.
landing.peopleYouAreLookingFor: The people you're looking for are here
landing.findAndConnect: Find and connect with your candidates on a leading global matching and hiring platform.
landing.postYourJobDescription: Create compelling job descriptions using our templates and screening tools to attract quality candidates who meet your criteria.
landing.reviewApplicationsDescription: Use smart filtering and evaluation tools to quickly identify the best candidates from your applicant pool.
landing.connectAndHireDescription: Communicate directly with candidates, schedule interviews, and make hiring decisions all in one platform.
landing.accessToQualityCandidatesDescription: Tap into baltek Karyera's extensive network of active job seekers and professionals.
landing.streamlinedHiringProcessDescription: Manage your entire recruitment workflow from one integrated platform.
landing.realTimeCollaborationDescription: Keep your hiring team aligned with instant messaging and shared candidate notes.
landing.dataDrivenInsightsDescription: Make informed decisions with comprehensive analytics and hiring performance metrics.
landing.enterpriseSecurityDescription: Rest assured with enterprise-grade security and data protection standards.
landing.dedicatedSupportDescription: Get help when you need it with our responsive customer support team.
landing.footerDescription: Transform your hiring process with our comprehensive HR dashboard. Connect with quality candidates and streamline your recruitment workflow.

privacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy
privacyPolicy.introText: This Privacy Policy describes how baltek business collects, uses, and protects your personal information when you use our HR dashboard platform.
privacyPolicy.personalInfo: Personal information such as name, email, and contact details
privacyPolicy.usageData: Usage analytics and platform interaction data
privacyPolicy.serviceProvision: To provide and improve our HR dashboard services
privacyPolicy.communication: To communicate with you about your account and services
privacyPolicy.matching: To facilitate job matching and candidate connections
privacyPolicy.analytics: To analyze usage patterns and improve platform performance
privacyPolicy.protectionText: We implement industry-standard security measures to protect your personal information. Your data is encrypted in transit and at rest, and access is restricted to authorized personnel only.
privacyPolicy.rightsText: You have the right to access, update, or delete your personal information. You may also request data portability or object to certain processing activities. Contact us to exercise these rights.
privacyPolicy.contactText: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us through our support channels.

termsOfService.title: Terms of Service
termsOfService.acceptanceText: By accessing and using baltek business, you accept and agree to be bound by the terms and provision of this agreement.
termsOfService.serviceText: baltek business is a comprehensive HR dashboard platform that enables organizations to manage job postings, review applications, and communicate with candidates.
termsOfService.lawfulUse: Use the platform in compliance with applicable laws
termsOfService.accountSecurity: Protect your account credentials and notify us of any security breaches
termsOfService.illegalActivities: Any illegal activities or violation of laws
termsOfService.spam: Sending spam, bulk messages, or unsolicited communications
termsOfService.systemInterference: Attempting to interfere with or disrupt the platform
termsOfService.ipText: The platform and its original content, features, and functionality are owned by baltek and are protected by international copyright, trademark, and other intellectual property laws.
termsOfService.limitationText: In no event shall baltek be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, consequential, or punitive damages resulting from your use of the platform.
termsOfService.terminationText: We may terminate or suspend your account and access to the platform immediately, without prior notice, for any reason, including breach of these Terms.
termsOfService.changesText: We reserve the right to modify these Terms at any time. Changes will be effective immediately upon posting to the platform.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.subtitle: We're here to help. Reach out to us anytime.
contact.subject: Subject
contact.messagePlaceholder: Tell us how we can help you...

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Find answers to common questions about using baltek business.
faq.q1: How do I create an account?
faq.a1: Click the 'Sign In' button and follow the OAuth2 authentication process to create your account.
faq.q2: How do I set up my organization?
faq.a2: After logging in, you'll be guided through the organization setup process where you can add your company details and configure settings.
faq.a3: You can post jobs, review applications, communicate with candidates, and manage your organization's hiring process all in one place.
faq.q4: How do I create a job posting?
faq.a4: Navigate to the Jobs section and click 'Create Job'. Fill in the job details, requirements, and publish your posting.
faq.q5: Can I edit a job after posting?
faq.a5: Yes, you can edit job postings at any time from the Jobs management page. Changes will be reflected immediately.
faq.q6: How long do job postings stay active?
faq.a6: Job postings remain active until you manually close them or until their specified end date.
faq.a7: Go to the Applications section to view all submitted applications. You can filter, sort, and review candidate profiles.
faq.a8: Yes, you can communicate with candidates through our built-in messaging system for real-time communication.
faq.q9: How do I track application status?
faq.a9: Each application has a status that you can update (Under Review, Interview, Hired, Rejected) to track progress.
faq.q10: How do I update my profile?
faq.a10: Go to the Profile section where you can update your personal information, contact details, and preferences.
faq.q11: Can I change my organization details?
faq.a11: Yes, organization details can be updated from the Organization section in your dashboard.
faq.a12: Notification preferences can be configured in your account settings to receive updates about applications and messages.
faq.noResults: No FAQ items found matching your search.
faq.contactSupport: Can't find what you're looking for? Contact our support team.
